# serval_access_policy (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "serval_access_policy" "example_access_policy" {
  description = "description"
  max_access_minutes = 0
  name = "name"
  recommended_access_minutes = 0
  require_business_justification = true
  team_id = "teamId"
}
```

## Argument Reference

This resource supports the following arguments:

- `description` (Optional) A description of the access policy.
- `max_access_minutes` (Optional) The maximum number of minutes that access can be granted for.
- `name` (Optional) The name of the access policy.
- `recommended_access_minutes` (Optional) The recommended duration in minutes for access requests.
- `require_business_justification` (Optional) Whether a business justification is required when requesting access.
- `team_id` (Optional) The ID of the team.

## Attribute Reference

This resource exports the following attributes in addition to the arguments above:

- `id` (String) The ID of the access policy.

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

```shell
$ terraform import serval_access_policy.example '<id>'
```
